summary: A small cave-house located in the snowy slopes of the Throat of the World.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This little place, to the left of where you'll meet Karita, is a comfy cave with some basic amenities - a bed, an alchemy station, cooking spit, a bookcase, and safe storage. It has a small (and in my opinion at least, amusing) little backstory.

The place is fully navmeshed for your followers and there are a couple of idle markers, so they can stay here while you deal with the Greybeards and such.

Have fun!

I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Link [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=137159015]here[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
